subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ J.R. Smith, who won the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man of the Year Award, has been regarded as one of the most gifted shooting guards in the league, but with a questionable head. In mid-March, his outlook changed.
snippet: The Knicks’ J.R. Smith, who won the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man of the Year Award, has been regarded as one of the most gifted shooting guards in the league, but with a questionable head. In mid-March, his outlook changed.
